links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (10,-45,120,-210,252,-210,120,-45,10,-1).
formula: Number of 15-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 6 contiguous pairs; g.f. 28*(1+2x)*x^2/(1-x)^10.a(n) = C(n+1, 3)*C(n+6, 6). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 08 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 10 2016
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
